title: Create a custom function using the functions from math_cpu.cc source code in Caffe2?
body_html: I would like to write my own convolution function in C++ using the GEMM functions defined in math_cpu.cc. I am planning to write a python wrapper for the function and use in a python environment. Is this possible? The reason for this is that the dependencies are already present with the installation of caffe2.
body_text: I would like to write my own convolution function in C++ using the GEMM functions defined in math_cpu.cc. The reason for this is that the dependencies are already present with the installation of caffe2.
